participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Caring and family-oriented, Michael enjoys spending quality time with his loved ones and is always ready to lend a helping hand.
participant_1.background: my wife and kids are the best. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate. i've three children. i'm a plumber. i love going to the park with my three children and my wife.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and optimistic, Jessica is excited about her new life and looks forward to the challenges of motherhood.
participant_2.background: i recently moved to this country. i am expecting triplets in three months. i work at a school. i just moved into my first home.
